title: Looking for ffffound.com invite
content:
If anyone can sort me out with a ffffound.com invite I would really appreciate it. I’ve been looking for ages now for one.

 [‹ Just a suggestion for the Type ID board...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43544 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ffffound account ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42015 "Go to next forum topic")
author: randomvector

comments.content:
Yep. Same here. :)  
No luck so far.
true, true. anybody know when they come out of beta?
i haven’t got a clue when the beta finishes. It might be like Gmail in the beginning with it only being invite only to keep it more exclusive.

Maybe it should stay invite-based. ;)  
The quality of posted images already fluctuates, I wonder what it will be with half the world posting.

Try [We heart it](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000710/http:/weheartit.com/). Just launched. Same concept as Ffffound but arguably a more functional design, plus tags and comments. Here’s [my page](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000710/http:/weheartit.com/user/stewf).
